predicate.note: Frames file for 'translate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'change'.

example.name: passive, unstated start state
example.text: The profit gain was made despite a weakening in the housing market, for which the company is a supplier, and a strengthening in the dollar, which lowers the value of overseas earnings when they are translated *trace* into dollars.

example.name: passive without trace
example.text: That gain probably translated into about 5% to 7% in dollar terms, well below recent quarters' gains of above 20%, reckons Jay Stevens of Dean Witter Reynolds.
example.arg: about 5 % to 7 % in dollar terms , well below recent quarters ' gains of above 20 %

example.name: all args
example.text: John translated his dissertation from English into Swahili, Chinese, Russian, and Yiddish.
